ARABIC: فَسَتَذْكُرُونَ مَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمْ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمْرِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَصِيرٌۢ بِٱلْعِبَادِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You will remember what I say to you. I consign my affair completely to Allah. Truly Allah sees His slaves.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You will remember what I say in time to come; I submit my case to the judgement of God. Surely God keeps an eye on His creatures."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Soon you shall remember what I say to you. I entrust my affairs to Allah. Surely Allah is watchful over His servants.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You will soon recall what I have told you. I entrust God with my affairs. God is Well Aware of His servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And soon the time will come when you will remember what I now say to you; and I entrust my tasks to Allah; indeed Allah sees the bondmen.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And you will remember what I am telling you, and my affair I leave it to Allah. Verily, Allah is the All-Seer of (His) servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So you shall remember what I say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah, Surely Allah sees the servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: You will remember what I say to you. I commit my affair to God; surely God sees His servants.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And ye will remember what I say unto you. I confide my cause unto Allah. Lo! Allah is Seer of (His) slaves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Soon you will remember what I say to you! I shall entrust my affair to God, for God is observant of all [His] servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And anon ye shall remember that which am telling you. Confide my affair Unto God; verily God is the Beholder of His bondmen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Soon you will remember what I tell you, and I entrust my affair to Allah. Indeed Allah watches His servants.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Soon will ye remember what I say to you (now), My (own) affair I commit to Allah: for Allah (ever) watches over His Servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And you will remember what I am telling you, and my affair I leave it to Allah. Verily, Allah is the All-Seer of (His) slaves."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You will remember what I say to you. To Allah I commit my affair, surely, Allah sees His worshipers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You will remember what I am telling you, so I commit my case to God. God is Observant of the servants.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah. Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:44] For you will [soon] remember what I have said to you, when you see the chastisement with your own eyes. And I entrust my affair to God. Truly God is Seer of [His] servants’ — he said this after they threatened him [with retribution] for opposing their religion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And ye will remember) you will know on the Day of Judgement (what I say unto you) in the life of the world regarding the torment. (I confide) I consign (my cause unto Allah) trusting in Him. (Lo! Allah is Seer of (His) slaves) He sees those who believe in Him and those who do not.
